_list._blog_post_body:
Things I would do if unimaginably rich:

Sleep on a pile of gold doubloons.

Hide treasure behind waterfalls.

Buy other peoples souls to use as bargaining chips in the afterlife.

@el_burro_muerto I don't think you have to do as much contortions as me in order to get a long view. Mostly we can just see into other flats/offices.

I've consider cheating by mounting one of them old skool shop mirrors for looking around corners on the wall :)

_list._blog_post_body:
Bad news everyone!

Tomorrow is the #Bradford #Gamedev meetup in a pub.

but pubs ceased to exist a couple of weeks ago, I think we will be in some sort of virtual meeting thing on our https://www.twitch.tv/wetgenes from 7-9pm tomorrow so you can join or watch...

_list._blog_post_body:
I am really disgusted by the amount of jokes about guillotines.

Once again I need to remind everyone that the guillotine is a dirty French invention and in this country we use the Wicker-Man.

A guarantee of a bountiful harvest and a great day out for the kids.

2020-04-05

I am really disgusted by the amount of jokes about guillotines.

Once again I need to remind everyone that the guillotine is a dirty French invention and in this country we use the Wicker-Man.

A guarantee of a bountiful harvest and a great day out for the kids.
